snippet: We reported yesterday the proceedings of the meeting at the City Hall, held for the purpose of taking measures to do honor to the memory of the late J. FENIMORE COOPER. Appended to the report were letters from several distinguished literary gentle...
lead_paragraph: We reported yesterday the proceedings of the meeting at the City Hall, held for the purpose of taking measures to do honor to the memory of the late J. FENIMORE COOPER. Appended to the report were letters from several distinguished literary gentlemen who had been invited to attend. In addition to these we now give the following:
